Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
2.
2762Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe paṭicca…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. (1)
2763Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  bahiddhā ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. (1)
<< Hetuup Adhipati >>
